This transaction was made pursuant to a Rule 10b5-1 trading plan adopted by the reporting person on August 12, 2015. This transaction was executed in multiple trades at prices ranging from $110.00 to $110.06; the price reported above reflects the weighted average sale price. The reporting person hereby undertakes to provide full information regarding the number of shares and prices at which the transactions were effected upon request to te SEC staff, the Registrant, or a security holder of the Registrant. Shares held by a family trust of which the reporting person is a trustee. The reporting person disclaims beneficial ownership in these shares except as to the reporting person's pecuniary interest in the trust.
/s/ Sam Whittington, Attorney-in-Fact for Philip W. Schiller 2016-04-01
